Customize_GIPHY_APIKey_Description: Please get your own GIPHY API key at https://developers.giphy.com
Customize_GIPHY_Rating_Description: The MPAA-style rating for this content. Examples include Y, G, PG, PG-13 and R
Customize_GIPHY_Show_Title_Description: Shows the title of the gif (if a title exists)
GIPHY_Command_Description: Search for a matching GIF (Powered by GIPHY)
GIPHY_Error_Sending: An error occurred when trying to send the gif :disappointed_relieved:
